item.title: Vietjet's SkyBoss enhances the premium customer experience
item.description:
Source: Vietjet. Vietjet now offers SkyBoss, a premium travel class. SkyBoss passengers receive priority check-in, a 20kg checked baggage allowance, priority seat selection, airport lounge access, in-flight meals, extra legroom, and flexible flight date and time changes. Established in 2011, Vietjet Air is Vietnam’s first privately held airline. Since its inception, Vietjet has served over 12 million passengers across 32 domestic and international routes. The airline currently operates two daily flights between Singapore’s Changi International Airport and Ho Chi Minh City’s Tan Son Nhat International Airport...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/vietjet-s-skyboss-enhances-the-premium-customer-experience/

item.title: Take advantage of the week-long Vietjet promotion
item.description:
Source: Vietjet website. Vietjet Aviation Joint Stock Company (Vietjet), an airline with 32 domestic and international routes, is offering a limited-time promotion with 500,000 discounted tickets. This offer is valid for one week, ending on Wednesday, July 29th, 2015. The promotion applies to all of Vietjet’s current domestic and international routes for travel between September 7th, 2015 and December 31st, 2015. Discounted fares will be displayed in a separate column during booking...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/take-advantage-of-the-week-long-vietjet-promotion/
